comments.body: I think this should be `if tags and tags != igw.tags:`. Otherwise if we're creating a gateway with no tags this condition will be met and it will crash later since there are no tags. On second thought, just make the default of tags be an empty dict instead of None, [here](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/23782/files#diff-7c7439a69b0a017fb8e03a769c5ef29bR179) and it will fix the problem.
@s-hertel tags defaults to an empty dict as per the argument spec; can you mark this as reviewed?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +159,163 @@    igw.vpc_id = vpc_id

    if tags != igw.tags:
        ensure_tags(vpc_conn, igw.id, tags, False, check_mode)
        igw.tags = tags

comments.body: Should probably use `compare_aws_tags` for future reference but not a blocker here as it is only recently available
